text.section:
The Commissioner or Commissioner's designee may grant family leave to allow an inmate to visit the inmate's family for a reasonable time if the inmate:
is confined in a correctional facility in the Division;
is classified to be in prerelease status; and
is recommended by the correctional facility's case management team and managing official.

section.section:
When granting family leave to an inmate, the Commissioner or Commissioner's designee shall:
issue a written authorization to the inmate that specifies the conditions of the family leave; and
file a copy of the authorization in the Commissioner's office.
While on family leave, an inmate at all times shall possess a copy of the authorization for family leave.

text.section: The failure of an inmate to comply with the terms of the authorization for family leave is a violation of § 9-404 of the Criminal Law Article.
The Commissioner may adopt regulations to carry out this section.
